item.title: 华为手机和芯片需求强劲，销售额增长 16
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s revenue grew for the seventh straight quarter after its smartphones enjoyed sustained demand in China at Apple Inc.’s expense.】

item.title: Peloton 聘用福特高管担任首席执行官，领导扭亏为盈工作
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司任命福特汽车公司高管彼得-斯特恩（Peter Stern）为下一任首席执行官，委托他领导这家长期陷入困境的健身公司实现扭亏为盈。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. named Ford Motor Co. executive Peter Stern as its next chief executive officer, entrusting him to lead a turnaround of the long-struggling fitness company.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格不再谈论 Meta 的选举计划
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格过去喜欢在财报电话会议上谈论选举。现在不会了。但首先...【原文：Mark Zuckerberg used to love talking about elections on earnings calls. Not anymore. But first...】

item.title: Y Combinator 的卢瑟-洛威（Luther Lowe）为初创企业提供了自己的特区代言人
item.description:
在帮助领导初创企业反对加州人工智能法规的斗争之后，这位科技政策资深人士又有了新的斗争目标。【原文：

After helping lead startups’ crusade against California AI regulation, the tech policy veteran has new fights to pick. 

】

item.title: 特姆公司遭欧盟调查可能销售非法产品
item.description: 欧盟已对电子商务平台 Temu 展开调查，调查该公司是否采取了足够措施打击其网站上的非法产品销售。【原文：The European Union has launched an investigation into e-commerce platform Temu and whether the company is doing enough to combat sales of illegal products on its site.】

item.title: SoftwareOne 指导性目标下调后股价跌至历史新低
item.description: SoftwareOne Holding AG 股价暴跌，原因是该软件公司下调了指导目标，并报告收入低于预期。【原文：SoftwareOne Holding AG shares tumbled after the software company cut guidance and reported lower-than-expected revenue.】

item.title: 优步发布节假日预测，利润创历史新高
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. reported weaker-than-expected ride bookings and issued a middling forecast for the holiday quarter, even as it delivered record operating profit.】

item.title: 随着西班牙交易判决的临近，BBVA 和 Sabadell 在竞争问题上发生冲突
item.description: BBVA SA 和 Banco Sabadell SA 就拟议中的对这家较小银行的收购是否会损害西班牙银行服务的提供发生了冲突，而此时距离西班牙竞争管理机构做出决定仅有数周时间。【原文：BBVA SA and Banco Sabadell SA clashed over whether the proposed takeover of the smaller lender will hurt the provision of banking services in Spain, just weeks before the country’s competition authority is set to weigh in.】

item.title: 市场疲软，香港水下抵押贷款创 22 年新高
item.description: 由于香港房地产市场持续低迷，香港超出房屋价值的抵押贷款额跃升至二十多年来的最高水平。【原文：The value of mortgages in Hong Kong that have exceeded the worth of the homes jumped to the highest level in more than two decades as the city’s property market continues to struggle.】

item.title: 梯瓦因打压竞争对手被欧盟罚款 4.63 亿欧元
item.description: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.被欧盟反垄断监管机构处以近 4.63 亿欧元（5.03 亿美元）的罚款，原因是该公司不公平地诋毁了竞争对手的一家多发性硬化症药物生产商，从而阻碍了公平竞争。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. has been fined nearly €463 million ($503 million) by the European Union’s antitrust watchdog for thwarting fair competition by unfairly disparaging a rival maker of a multiple sclerosis drug.】

item.title: 贸易商竞相争取泰晤士河水务公司的应急资金
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）正试图从债权人那里获得一笔紧急资金，债务交易商们正在提高他们对这笔资金的出价，这也表明了这些条款对投资者的吸引力有多大。【原文：Debt traders are upping their bids for pieces of the proposed emergency funding Thames Water is trying to secure from creditors, in a sign of how attractive the terms are to investors.】

item.title: 让华尔街胆战心惊的图表
item.description: 岌岌可危的市盈率："我们正处于 S&P 500 指数现代史上第三高的估值水平，仅次于 1999/2000 年和 2021 年。约翰-汉考克投资管理公司（John Hancock Investment Management）联席首席投资策略师艾米丽-罗兰德（Emily Roland）说："如果这种估值上扬的趋势持续下去，那么前瞻性回报的吸引力将大打折扣。【原文：Sky-high stock valuations, super-concentrated markets and the US government’s enormous interest bill — here are the charts spooking investors.Precarious P/E: “We are at the third-highest valuations on the S&P 500 in modern history only behind 1999/2000 and 2021. If this valuation upside continues, it leaves forward-looking returns less compelling,” says Emily Roland, co-chief investment strategist for John Hancock Investment Management.】

item.title: 国际清算银行退出普京吹捧的跨境支付项目
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）认定数字跨境支付的基础技术是规避制裁和潜在破坏美元的工具之后，国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）将退出该项目。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements is leaving a project for digital cross-border payments after Russia’s president Vladimir Putin identified the underlying technology as a tool to circumvent sanctions and potentially undermine the dollar.】

item.title: 欧洲一触即发的天然气市场风险将持续到冬季之后
item.description: 欧洲天然气贸易商原本以为今年冬天会迎来最后一个价格失控的冬天，但最近几周的情况表明，下一个供暖季的情况可能会更糟。【原文：Europe’s gas traders were expecting this winter to see the last of hair-trigger prices, but in recent weeks it’s become clear that the following heating season could be even worse.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚通过新税收将税收目标提高一倍，达到 125 亿美元
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织（IMF）的一项融资计划中，埃塞俄比亚将其收入目标提高了一倍多，该计划提出了改革东非最大经济体的若干条件。【原文：Ethiopia is more than doubling its revenue target amid an International Monetary Fund financing program that sets out several conditions to reform East Africa’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率超预期升至欧洲央行目标值
item.description: 欧元区通胀加速超过预期，与欧洲中央银行的目标一致，这也为逐步降低利率提供了依据。【原文：Euro-area inflation accelerated more than expected — matching the European Central Bank’s target and boosting arguments for interest rates to be lowered gradually.】

item.title: 在最新民意调查中，腐败问题压倒了哥伦比亚人关注的其他所有问题
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，哥伦比亚人对腐败官员的愤怒远远超过对国家面临的所有其他问题的愤怒。【原文：Colombians are far angrier about crooked officials than they are about all the other problems facing their nation, according to a new poll.】

item.title: 欧洲央行帕内塔警告低通胀风险要求更多降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧洲央行必须继续降低借贷成本，以防止通胀超调。【原文：The European Central Bank must continue to lower borrowing costs to keep inflation from undershooting, according to Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 诺和诺德银行称对结束股息限制谈判持 "乐观 "态度
item.description: 诺和诺德银行（Novo Banco SA）表示，它对其股东达成允许这家葡萄牙贷款机构支付股息的协议持 "乐观态度"。【原文：Novo Banco SA said it’s “optimistic” on its shareholders reaching an agreement that would allow the Portuguese lender to pay dividends, a step that’s needed before a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 沙特养老基金将支持布鲁克菲尔德的中东新企业
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯社会保险总组织将支持布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）新成立的中东合资公司，该公司还吸引了沙特阿拉伯王国主权财富基金作为主要投资者。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s General Organization for Social Insurance is set to back Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.’s new Middle East venture, which has also drawn the kingdom’s sovereign wealth fund as an anchor investor.】

item.title: 本周大型科技公司财报喜忧参半，苹果和亚马逊成为焦点
item.description: 本周四晚些时候，苹果公司和亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Whether this Big Tech earnings season turns out to be a success or disappointment will likely come down to results from Apple Inc. and Amazon.com Inc. later Thursday.】

item.title: 关税上调后，中国电动汽车制造商在欧盟的销量下滑
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商连续第三个月在欧洲市场失利，这是进口关税提高损害销售的最新迹象。【原文：Chinese electric-car makers lost ground in Europe for a third straight month, in the latest sign that higher import tariffs are hurting sales.】

item.title: 人民币在全球的使用量在外汇走强的情况下于 9 月份大幅下降
item.description: 根据全球金融信息服务公司 Swift 编制的交易数据，上个月人民币在全球支付中的使用量创下历史最高纪录。【原文：Use of the yuan in global payments slumped by the most on record last month, according to transaction data compiled by global financial messaging service Swift.】

item.title: 香港调低上市股票的市场鸣叫规则
item.description: 香港证券监察机构在采纳了对冲基金和银行业的反馈意见后，调整了所谓的市场声音做法指引。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities watchdog toned down its guidelines for so-called market sounding practices after incorporating feedback from the hedge fund and banking industry.】

item.title: 中国正成为欧洲利润记分卡上的大问题
item.description: 随着需求疲软、政府审查以及与贸易伙伴之间的关税争端给股市带来压力，越来越多的欧洲企业将盈利前景黯淡归咎于中国。【原文：A broadening array of European firms is blaming China for glum earnings outlooks, as weak demand, government scrutiny and tariff spats with the trading partner put pressure on stocks.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦航空公司出售获得一家房地产集团竞标
item.description: 巴基斯坦只收到了一份购买国旗航空公司巴基斯坦国际航空公司多数股权的最终竞标书，这对过去曾多次失败的巴基斯坦来说是一次重要的出售。【原文：Pakistan received only one final bid to buy a majority stake in the national flag carrier Pakistan International Airlines Corp., a significant sale for the country that has failed multiple times in the past.】

item.title: 里夫斯公布预算案后市场仍处于紧张状态，英国债券下跌
item.description: 英国债券下跌，原因是市场对政府未来几年大规模借贷和财政刺激的新计划仍心存疑虑。【原文：UK bonds fell as the market remains on edge over the government’s new plans for vast borrowing and fiscal stimulus over the coming years.】

item.title: 肯尼亚通货膨胀率降至至少 14 年来的最低水平
item.description: 在燃料、食品和公用事业价格增长放缓之后，肯尼亚的年通货膨胀率降至至少 2010 年以来的最低水平。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate fell to the lowest level since at least 2010 after fuel, food and utility price growth eased.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气市场保持稳定，交易商正在评估该地区的供应平衡状况
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格稳定在每兆瓦时 41 欧元附近，因为交易商评估了喜忧参半的天气预报和持续低迷的燃料需求。【原文：European natural gas prices steadied near €41 a megawatt-hour as traders assess mixed weather forecasts against persistently low demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 南非央行不太可能很快降低 CPI 目标
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，南非不太可能在二月份的预算中制定新的通胀目标。【原文：South Africa is unlikely to have a new inflation target by February’s budget, Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said.】
